name: DISC TEMPLE
description:
ARE YOU READY TO FIGHT BACK?

The year is 2043 and an ancient disc temple has been discovered on earth. Take aim with your trusty rifle and explore the long forgotten death trap.

Explore the ancient temple, moving room to room and killing the increasingly lethal discs. As you progress you will gain weapon upgrades that increase your killing power and allow you to continue deeper into the temple.

And remember to always: fight back!

CONTROLS
  • Move: W A S D
  • Shoot Left Mouse button
SOCIAL

If you enjoyed my game and would like to support me, feel free to follow me on social media or leave a donation on one of my games :)
